name: outbreaklens-monorepo
description: OutbreakLens - Diagnose Today, Predict Tomorrow | AI-Powered Malaria Diagnosis & Outbreak Forecasting

scripts.db:generate: powershell -Command "Copy-Item 'apps/web/.env.local' 'apps/database/.env' -Force; Set-Location 'apps/database'; npx prisma generate; Remove-Item '.env' -Force"
scripts.db:push: powershell -Command "Copy-Item 'apps/web/.env.local' 'apps/database/.env' -Force; Set-Location 'apps/database'; npx prisma db push; Remove-Item '.env' -Force"
scripts.db:migrate: powershell -Command "Copy-Item 'apps/web/.env.local' 'apps/database/.env' -Force; Set-Location 'apps/database'; npx prisma migrate dev; Remove-Item '.env' -Force"
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: powershell -Command "Copy-Item 'apps/web/.env.local' 'apps/database/.env' -Force; Set-Location 'apps/database'; npx prisma migrate deploy; Remove-Item '.env' -Force"
scripts.db:studio: powershell -Command "Copy-Item 'apps/web/.env.local' 'apps/database/.env' -Force; Set-Location 'apps/database'; npx prisma studio; Remove-Item '.env' -Force"
scripts.db:seed: powershell -Command "Copy-Item 'apps/web/.env.local' 'apps/database/.env' -Force; Set-Location 'apps/database'; npx prisma db seed; Remove-Item '.env' -Force"
scripts.postinstall: powershell -Command "Copy-Item 'apps/web/.env.local' 'apps/database/.env' -Force; Set-Location 'apps/database'; npx prisma generate; Remove-Item '.env' -Force"

author: OutbreakLens Team
